member.name: DVEXTENTMODE
member.summary: Indicates whether the sizing mode is content or integral sizing.

member.name: DVEXTENTMODE.DVEXTENT_CONTENT
member.summary: Indicates that the container will ask the object how big it wants to be to exactly fit its content, for example, in snap-to-size operations.

member.name: DVEXTENTMODE.DVEXTENT_INTEGRAL
member.summary: Indicates that the container will provide a proposed size to the object for its use in resizing.
